thread.title: Steve Martin gets serious as curator of artist Lawren Harris
thread.title_full: Steve Martin gets serious as curator of artist Lawren Harris

title: Steve Martin gets serious as curator of artist Lawren Harris
text: > Entertainment Steve Martin gets serious as curator of artist Lawren Harris In this Wed., Oct. 7, 2015, photo, curator and actor-comedian, Steve Martin, second from right, co-curator Andrew Hunter, left, Ann Philbin, second from left, Director of The Hammer Museum, and co-curator Cynthia Burlingham pose in a gallery for the exhibition, "The Idea of North: The Paintings of Lawren Harris," at The Hammer Museum in in Los Angeles. The show, which travels to Boston’s Museum of Fine Arts and Canada’s Art Gallery of Ontario next year, opens Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP)
